data.title: Happily surprised!
data.text: To be honest, I expected to be underwhelmed, but I am happy to be proven wrong! I am a supporter of downtown Canton businesses and had heard nothing, good or bad, about this restaurant. We visited on a First Friday, which has to be the busiest night of each month in Downtown Canton. It was comfortably full, with live music, and a happy, comfortable feel. The staff was busy, yet everyone seemed happy. Our waitress was very good, keeping us informed of the status of our order, and apologizing for a kitchen delay, even offering to comp one of our meals, which we declined since she had been so up-front with us about the delay. My scrod and hubby's pork chop were very good. Clean restaurant located a few blocks out of the arts district, but worth a visit. I hope you will be pleasantly surprised, like we were.
